warlock.name: Makeda and the Exalted Court

melee_weapon.name: Talon of Murzoul
melee_weapon.capacity: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in wich it destroyed a living ennemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell with COST 3 or less without spending fury.

warlock.feat: When a model in Makeda's battlegroup destroys one or more ennemy models in her control area with an attack, either Makeda can gain 1 fury point or 1 fury point can be removed from a model un her battlegroup that is in her control area. Dance of Death lasts for one turn.
warlock.spell: Immediately after this attack is resolved, this model can advance up to 2" for each ennemy model destroyed by the attack.

Center a 5" AOE on thie model. Each other model in the AOE is hit and suffers a POW 13 damage roll. Each ennemy model damaged by Ground Zero is pushed d6" directly away from this model in the order you choose.
Ennemy warbeasts/warjacks that advances more than 1" and end their normal movement in this model's control area suffer d3 damage points.
Damage rolls against ennemy models in this model's range are automatically boosted.
warlock.capacity: When a model in this unit is damaged by an ennemy attack, after the attack is resolved models in this unit gain +2 STR and ARM and Pathfinder for one round.
Friendly Skorne models/units in this model's command range never flee ans immediately rally.
This unit is made up of Makeda and 2 Exalted Guardians.

weapons.capacity: When a model in this unit is damaged by an ennemy attack, after the attack is resolved models in this unit gain +2 STR and ARM and Pathfinder for one round

Once per round, when a friendly model is directly hit by a ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 2" of this model, you can choos to have this model directly hit instead. This model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. This model cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down or stationnary.
When a model in this unit is damaged by an ennemy attack, after the attack is resolved models in this unit gain +2 STR and ARM and Pathfinder for one round

Once per round, when a friendly model is directly hit by a ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 2" of this model, you can choos to have this model directly hit instead. This model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. This model cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down or stationnary.

warlock.name: Lord Tyrant Hexeris

melee_weapon.name: Gulgata
melee_weapon.capacity: Immediately after a normal attack with this weapon is resolved during this model's combat action, the ennemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the ennemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1".
When it destroys a living ennemy model with this weapon, immediately after the attack is resolved this model heals d3 damag points.

warlock.feat: When a living or undead ennemy model is boxed by an attack whil in Hexeris' control area, take control of it. The model becomes a friendly Undead model. If it is a trooper, it becomes a solo. The model can immediately advance up to 3" and can make one normal melee attack, then remove the model from play. When making this attack, ignore the effects of lost aspects on affected warbeasts. The model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. Dark Dominion lasts for one turn.
warlock.spell: Target friendly unit gains +2 MAT and Vengeance. (During your Maintenance Phase, if one or more models in a unit with Vengeance wer destroyed or remove from play by an ennemy attack during your opponent's last turn, each model in the unit can advance 3" and make one normal melee attack.)
The force of this attack blasts apart the earth itself.
When an ennemy model casts a spell or uses an animus while in this model's control area, the ennemy model suffers 1 damage point and this model heals 1 damage point.
When a living non-soulless model is boxed by Soulfire, this model gains 1 FURY point and the boxed model is removed from play.
Target warbeast in this model's battlegroup automatically passes threshold checks. This model can channel spells through the affected warbeast.
warlock.capacity: This model can reave fury points from an ennemy warbeasts destroyed in its control area if it is closer to the warbeast than all other models that could reave its fury.

warlock.name: Xerxis

melee_weapon.name: Pillars ok Halaak
melee_weapon.capacity: Make a melee attack. On a hit, instead of making a normal damage roll the target model is slammed d6" directly away from this model and suffers a damage roll with POW equal to the STR of this model plus twice the POW of this weapon. The POW of collateral damage is equal to this model's STR.

warlock.feat: While in Xerxis' contril area, friendly Faction models gain an additionnal die on their melee damage rolls. While in Xerxis' control area and B2B with another friendly Faction model, friendly Faction models gain +2 ARM. Total Annihilation lasts for one round.
warlock.spell: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 DEF and ARM.
Target friendly model/unit gains +3 to melee damage rolls but suffers -1 DEF.
While in this model's control area, ennemy models treat open terrain as rough terrain. Inhospitable Ground lasts for one round.
warlock.capacity: During this model's activation, it can use one of the following plans. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.
RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range it gains Pathfinder for one turn.
RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range it gains +2 SPD when making a full advance this turn.

Friendly living Faction warrior models with small or medium bases can ignore friendly Faction warrior models in this model's command range when determining LOS and can advance through friendly Faction warrior models in this model's command range if they have enough movement to move completely past them.
When this model destroys one or more ennemy warrior models with a normal melee attack, after the attack is reseolved this model can immediately advance up to 1".

warbeast.name: Cyclops Savage
warbeast.animus: Target friendly faction model gains Future Sight. Prescience last for one turn.
warbeast.capacity: This model can boost attack and damage rolls after rolling.

warbeast.name: Cyclops Shaman
warbeast.animus: Target friendly faction model gains Future Sight. Prescience last for one turn.
warbeast.capacity: This model can boost attack and damage rolls after rolling.

warbeast.name: Basilisk Drake
warbeast.animus: Target frinedly model gains Bushwack. Lurker lasts for one turn. (During its activation, a model with Bushwack can make its combat action before its normal movement. If it does, it must make a full advance as its normal movement this activation.)

warbeast.name: Basilisk Krea

ranged_weapon.name: SPIRITUAL PARALYSIS
ranged_weapon.capacity: The base DEF of a living model hit by this attack becomes 7, and the model hit cannot run or charge for one round.

warbeast.animus: This model gains +2 DEF and ARM against ranged attacks. While within 2" of this model, friendly models gain +2 DEF and ARM against ranged attacks and ennemy models suffer -2 DEF. Paralytic Aura lasts for one round.
warbeast.capacity: When this model make a melee attack against an ennemy model within the melee range of a friendly model of the type indicated, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an aditionnal damage die.

warbeast.name: Titan Gladiator

melee_weapon.name: TUSKS
melee_weapon.capacity: This model can add this weapon's POW on its head-butt and slam power attack damage rolls.

warbeast.animus: Target friendly warbeast gains +2" movement and Pathfinder. Rush lasts for one turn.
warbeast.capacity: When this model frenzies, if it would charge a model, it targets that model with a slam power attack instead. If it cannot, it frenzies normally.
When this model slams an ennemy model, immediately after the slam is resolved this model can advance directly toward the slammed model up to the distance the slammed model was moved.
This model can make slam power attacks without spending focus or being forced. Models slammed by this model are moved an additional 2".

warbeast.name: Bronzeback Titan

melee_weapon.name: TUSKS
melee_weapon.capacity: This model can add this weapon's POW on its head-butt and slam power attack damage rolls.

melee_weapon.name: WAR GAUNTLET
melee_weapon.capacity: If this model hits the same model with both it's initial attacks with this weapon, after resolving the attacks it can immediately make a double-hand throw, head-butt, headlock/wepaon lock, push, or throw power attack against that target.

warbeast.animus: Target friendly warbeast's gain Beat Back. train Wreck lasts for one turn. (Immediately after a normal attack with this weapon is resolved during this model's combat action, the ennemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the ennemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1".)
warbeast.capacity: When an ennemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of this model and in its LOS, this model can immediately charge it. If it does, it cannot make another counter charge until after your next turn. This model cannot make a counter charge while engaged.
When this model suffers damage from an ennemy attack anytime except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.
While in this model's command range, frinedly Titan non-Bronzeback warbeasts automatically pass THR checks.

warbeast.name: Molik Karn

melee_weapon.name: FALCHION
melee_weapon.capacity: Make a melee attack. Instead of making a normal damage roll, the POW of the damage roll is equal to this model's STR plus twice the POW of this weapon.

warbeast.animus: After all friendly models end their activation this turn, this model can make a full advance. Fate Walker lasts for one turn.
warbeast.capacity: While in Makeda's control area, Molik Karn gains +1 FURY.
While in this model's command range, friendly Cyclops models can use its current CMD and THR in place of their own current values.
This model can boost attack and damage rolls after rolling.
When an ennemy model targets this model with an attack and the attack roll results in a hit, you can immediately force this model to cause the ennemy to reroll the attack roll.
When this model hits with an initial attack or a special attack, it can advance 2" after the attack is resolved. This model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

warbeast.name: Mammoth

melee_weapon.name: TUSKS
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, instead of rolling damage normally you can choose to have this model throw the model hit. Treat the throw as if this model had hit and passed the STR check of a throw power attack. The thrown model suffers a damage roll with POW equal to this model's STR plus the POW of this weapon. The POW of collateral damage is equal to this model's STR.

warbeast.animus: When an ennemy model advances and ends its movement in this model's command range, this model can make on normal melee or ranged attack targetting that model, then Coounterblast expires. Counterblast lasts for one round.
warbeast.capacity: As part of a charge, after moving but before making its charge attack, this model can make one ranged attack targeting the model charged unless they were in melee with each other at the start of this model's activation. When resolving an Assault ranged attack, the attacking model does not suffer the target in melee penalty. If the target is not in melee range after moving, this model must still make the Assault ranged attack before its activaion ends.

When this model advances into B2B contact with an ennemy model during its activation, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per activation. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

unit.name: Bloodrunners
unit.capacity: When this model's melee attack damage roll fails to exceed the ARM of the living model hit, that model suffers 1 damage point.

If a model in this unit damages one or more ennemy models with a melee attack during its combat action, at the end of its combat action you can place one model in the unit in formation anywhere within 1" of another model in this unit.

ranged_weapon.name: HARPOON
ranged_weapon.capacity: If this weapon damages an enemy model with an equal or smaller base, immediately after the attack is resolved the damaged model can be pushed any distance directly toward this model. After the damaged model is moved, this model can make one normal melee attack against the model pushed. After resolving this melee attack. this model can make additional melee attacks during its combat action.

unit.name: Paingiver Beast Handlers

melee_weapon.name: BARBED WHIP
melee_weapon.capacity: When it its a warbeast with this weapon, this model can place 1 fury point on or remove 1 fury point from the warbeast.

unit.capacity: When this model's melee attack damage roll fails to exceed the ARM of the living model hit, that model suffers 1 damage point.
A warbeast can be affected by only one Beast Manipulation special action each turn.
RNG 3. Target friendly Faction warbeast. If the warbeast is in range, place any number of fury points on or remove any number of fury points from it.

RNG 3. Target friendly Faction warbeast. If the warbeast is in range, it gains +2 STR and must charge or make a slam or a trample power attack without being forced during its next activation. Enrage lasts for one turn.
RNG 3. Target friendly Faction warbeast. If the warbeast is in range, it heals d3 damage points. A warbeast can be affected by Medicate only once per turn.

melee_weapon.name: HALBERD
melee_weapon.capacity: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack rolls against this model.

model.capacity: During this model's activation, it can use one of the following plans. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.
RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range it gains Pathfinder for one turn.
RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range it gains +2 SPD when making a full advance this turn.
Knocked down friendly Faction models in this model's command range immadiately stand up. Models that were knocked down this turn are not affected by Reveille.
Friendly Skorne models/units in this model's command range never flee ans immediately rally.

solo.name: Agonizer
solo.capacity: Once du ring its activation, this model can spend 1 fury point to use one of the following effecs. Ennemy models suffer these effects while within 4" of this model + 1" per fury point on it. These effects last for one round.
Affected ennemy warbeasts suffer -2 to their damage rolls.
Affected ennemy warbeasts lose their animi. Affected ennemy warjacks lose Arc Node advantage and cannot be allocated focus.

While this models is in a friendly warlock's control area durinf the warlock's activation, the warlock can move fury points from itself to this model. This model can have up to 5 fury points at a time. While this model is in a friendly Faction warlock's control area, the warlock can leach fury from this model as if it were a warbeast.

solo.name: Extoler Soulward

ranged_weapon.name: SPIRIT EYE
ranged_weapon.capacity: When a living model is hit by this attack, add its current STR to the damage roll.
This model ignores LOS when making attacks with this weapon. When resolving attacks with this weapon, ignore concealment and cover.

solo.capacity: This model gains one soul token for each fiendly living Faction warrior model destroyed in its command range by a continuous effect, an ennemy attack, or collateral damage of an ennemy attack. This model can have up to five soul tokens at a time. During its activation, this model can spend soul tokens to gain additionnal attacks or to boost attack or damage rolls at one token per attack or boost.
This model gains +1 ARM for each soul token currently on it.
RNG 5. Target friendly Faction model. if the model is in range, it gains Eyeless Sight and its weapons gain Magical Weapon for one turn.

During its activation, you can remove soul tokens from this model and place them on friendly Faction models in this model's command range that have the Soul Guardian ability. A model cannot have more than three soul tokens as a result of Spirit Guide.

solo.name: Void Spirit

melee_weapon.name: TALON
melee_weapon.capacity: If a model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on the boxed model and then remove that model form play. The AOE remains in play for one round. Ennemy moedls in the AOE when it was put in play are hit and suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Ennemy models entering or ending their activation in the AOE suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Eruption of Ash damage rolls cannot be boosted.

solo.capacity: This model gains an additional die on melee damage rolls against living models. When a living model is destroyed within 3" of this model, it never generate a soul token.
When an ennemy model misses this model with an attack, immediately after the attack is resolved you can choose to push the ennemy model d3" directly away from this model.

solo.name: Aptimus Marketh
solo.capacity: Before the start ofthe game, attach this model to a friendly Faction warlock for the rest of the game. Each warlock can have only one model attached to it.

This model gains one soul token for each fiendly living Faction warrior model destroyed in its command range by a continuous effect, an ennemy attack, or collateral damage of an ennemy attack. This model can have up to five soul tokens at a time. During its activation, this model can spend soul tokens to gain additionnal attacks or to boost attack or damage rolls at one token per attack or boost.
This model gains +1 ARM for each soul token currently on it.
While this model is in its warlock's control area, its warlock can spend soul tokens on it to upkeep spells at one token par spell upkept.

This model must be in its warlock's control area to make the Spell Slave special action. When it does, it casts one of its warlock's spells with a COST of 3 or less. The warlock is considered to have cast that spell but this model is its point of origin. When making a magic attack roll, this model uses its warlock's FURY. This cannot cast spells with a RNG of SELF or CTRL.
